name: The Colosseum (epiplon)
description:
You've been selected among many warriors to participate against your will in a fighting contest. Your strength will be tested against the most horrific monsters from the depths of the Underworld.

The only price is your freedom.

Instructions:

  1. You need an original copy of Quake. Get it on GOG or Steam.
  2. You need a modern source port like Quakespasm.
  3. Download the mod and follow the instructions on the README file.
